Key Match Events: Alexander Djiku equalised with a stooping header
Richard Ofori made two big saves
Garry Rodrigues tapped into an empty net in the 92nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde upset Ghana with a stoppage-time winner to go top of Group B
Garry Rodrigues pounced to grab victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde went top of Group B
Jamiro Monteiro had put the islanders ahead
Ghana had a goal ruled out for offside before half-time
